title: How to Get Your Boyfriend Back: From the Husband He Turned Into
description: This title is no longer available. It has been re-published as:MAKE YOUR HUSBAND YOUR BOYFRIEND AGAIN by Julia Black.This book is a compendium of over-the-back-fence wisdom from countless discussions with others, assorted research, and personal experimentation.It's intended for the wife who wants to jazz up a marriage that's become a bit worn down from the usual demands of adult life.
author: Julia  Black
